3, The unauthorized use of the material in reference, or of any other belonging to the Informer, configures copyright infringement, a limited unlawful act, as provided for in international agreements (Berne Convention for the Protection of Literary and Artistic Works) regarding the matter, of which Brazil and the United 
States are signatories, as well as in the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, subjecting your company to the sanctions stipulated therein 
4. In view of the foregoing, this letter is an official notification under provisions of section 512(c) (3) of the U.S Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect removal of the detected infringement listed above

5. On behalf of the Owner of the exclusive right to the copyrighted material at issue in this notice I hereby state that I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law. 
6. I hereby state, under penalty of perjury, that the information in this notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that I am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is being infringed as set out in this notification. 
7. Finally, I kindly ask you to acknowledge receipt of this notice as well as to inform, within twenty-four (24') hours after having received the same, about the actions taken for the resolution of the outstanding issue, e-mailing me at lcoluccicabril.com.br. 
With Confidence, 
Laura lu i
